abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals says it will acquire PharmaSwiss, a maker of generic drugs, for 350 million euros.
snippet: Valeant Pharmaceuticals says it will acquire PharmaSwiss, a maker of generic drugs, for 350 million euros.
lead_paragraph: Valeant Pharmaceuticals said on Tuesday that it would acquire PharmaSwiss, the maker of generic drugs, for 350 million euros ($481 million).

headline.main: Valeant to Buy PharmaSwiss for $481 Million
